title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 465.1 - Purpose and scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 465.1 - Purpose and scope

State Regulations

There is a strong public policy in this State for public
access to judicial and administrative proceedings. The records in the case
files of the board and of its administrative law judge sections shall be made
available for inspection in accordance with the provisions of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
465.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
